name: sybaritically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves a lot of pleasure, especially when this is connected to the enjoyment of expensive things: He plays the wealthy man's son - idling overseas, he is sybaritically pursuing his calling as a jazz saxophonist. These people are way too rich and sybaritically inclined to dream of compromising on comfort in any way.
More examplesFewer examplesSome say the hot springs - pools of water from deep underground, heated to a sybaritically soothing temperature - are the region's best feature.
